name: get_individual_source_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ai_news_v2.
Tool description: This handy tool allows you to access the latest news about artificial intelligence from around the world, all in one place. Whether you're a business interested in keeping up with the latest trends, or just curious about what's going on, the AI news API is perfect for you.
API description: Fetches news articles related to police, crime, and accidents from a specified German newspaper.

newspaperid.description: The identifier of the newspaper from which to fetch news articles.
